text: Motiveâ€™s AI Dashcam
and suite products has been shown

to greatly reduce speeding
occurrences, collisions

and accidents, as well as
other unsafe driving behavior.
And looking to develop a solution

with our great AWS team, we
took a look at our landscape

as well as we already had
Amazon Redshift holding hundreds

of terabytes of our raw
vehicle message data.

And so how can we simplify
it and what was available?
And that's when they showed us zero-ETL
and that all those sources
that we're already using are already
available as integrations.

The results and impacts
were so clear from day one.

The speed and latency was
the biggest win for us.

And in our DynamoDB world,
we went from four hour

to six hour sync intervals
down to 30 minutes or so,
reliably as well.
And that was the other thing is that
we haven't had to touch it.
It just works.

We've saved over
$100,000 a year
by removing all that data transfer,

all those different mechanisms
and compute for loading,
and just getting the data there.

And we're able to now do
more features, do some

of our detections on a sooner
cadence, all these types

of things, which translates
to, you know, safer driving

and more visibility and easier
compliance for our customers.
